Participants.placeholder:
Enter participant public keys, one per line. Click 'Copy My Public Key' button above to start.
Example:
02a1b2c3d4e5f6789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890
03b2c3d4e5f6789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890ab

Tips:
• Click 'Copy My Public Key' to get your own public key
• Ask other participants to share their public keys with you
• Use the Connection screen to generate shareable URLs
• Each participant needs their own unique public key

Contract Steps.placeholder:
Enter contract steps, one per line. Each step can be signed individually by participants.

Example:
Proposal and scope agreement
Initial payment (50%)
Development phase begins
Code review and testing
Final delivery and documentation
Final payment (50%)
Project completion

Tips:
• Each line becomes a separate step
• Steps are executed in the order you list them
• Participants can sign each step when it's completed
• Empty lines are ignored
• Be specific - each step should be a clear milestone
